name: 施欣文
schedule: Students work on their own on their research and writing, meeting with me as needed. We set up monthly group draft deadlines, after which students peer review on another's work.
scorePolicy:
Students are graded on the following:
1) Their ability to meet deadlines
2) Their ability to write a draft of the proper length
3) The quality of each draft
4) Their effort in peer reviewing one another's work and their effort and helpfulness in our group peer discussions.
materials: I may request that students read particular articles or books as seems useful to their project. Sometimes I refer them back to articles we read in research methods.
consultation: My office hours are on Mondays from 3:10–6:00 and on Thursdays from 3:10–4:00, by appointment. Students can also reach me on MS Teams.
remarks: We will meet on MS Teams if we cannot meet in person.

name: 黃如瑩
objective:
本課程旨在發展學生獨立規劃及從事研究的能力，學生可在指導老師的指導下，依個別的需求選擇研究的方向，訂定題目，並獨立完成研究計畫，撰寫報告。
專題研究範圍含：實驗研究，量調查研究或質調查研究，個案研究，回溯研究，文化比較研究，理論闡述研究，等。
The purpose of this course is to guide our students to explore their interested field, to look for possible critical approaches, to locate intriguing issues, to map out the various aspects pertaining to the discussions on certain topic, and to work out an outline that will eventually lead to the completion of an MLA-styled academic paper.
schedule:
Unit One: Using research resources
Week 1 Introduction
Week 2 Library Tour
Week 3 Database I
Week 4 Database II
Unit Two: Searching for target field
Week 5 Internet resources
Week 6 Choosing for desired fields
Week 7 Focusing on one field
Week 8 Locating several areas of interest
Unit Three: Choosing a topic
Week 9 Deciding on one area
Week 10 Exploring several possibile issues
Week 11 Narrowing down on two to three issues
Week 12 Doing research on these issues
Unit Four: Choosing a topic
Week 13 Focusing on one topic
Week 14 Discovering various aspects of the issues
Week 15 Doing research on these specific issues
Week 16 Choosing one issue that especially interests you
Wrapping up
Week 17 Research on this specific issue
Week 18 Presentation of the specific title for your thesis
scorePolicy:
1. Participation meetings: 50%
2. Final project: research outcome  50%
materials:
1. Writing Research Papers:  A Norton Guide. 4th Edition. By Melissa Walker. new York: Norton. 1997.
2. Handbooks on MLA and APA Writing Styles.
